attributes.action: Freedom to Choose whatever appliance to use at home - Any wattage, Power or size.
attributes.additional_details: The latest news about Hoovers being reduced in power has charged me up (pardon the pun) - Sign this partition to allow us to have the freedom to choose whatever appliance we want at whatever power we want - After all - WE pay the bills! - It won't stop at Hoovers once this goes through and we must sign up to have this stupid Euro rule removed.
